scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures gathered together, with a dove descending from above. The figures, all with halos, are shown with their hands raised in prayer or supplication. The central figure, possibly Christ, is dressed in an orange tunic and a blue mantle. To his right, a woman in a green garment and a brown mantle is also depicted with raised hands. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or heavenly setting. The dove, a symbol of the Holy Spirit, is shown with outstretched wings, emitting rays of light towards the figures. The overall composition is contained within a circular border adorned with decorative elements.
